duties_responsibilities.duty: Developing and executing automated tests for software quality assurance.
Maintaining and improving test frameworks for efficient test execution.
Collaborating with developers to identify and document software defects.
Writing and optimizing SQL queries for test data management.
Working in Agile methodology to create test cases and contribute to build & release process.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
